General.Name: China Chippacking Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: China Chippacking Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the integrated circuit packaging and testing in China. The company also provides packaging technology solutions. Its products portfolio includes CPC, ECPC, DFN, QFN, LQFP, MSOP, DIP, QIPAI, EMSOP, SOP, SOT, SSOP, HSOP, TO, TSSOP, ESOP, and TSOT package form. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: No. 250, Pinglong West Road, Shenzhen, China, 523330
